sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je crains qu'il ne pleuve aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm afraid it will rain today.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pointe vers cette montagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is pointing at that mountain.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est ta profession ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is your profession?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 没有公交车，我只好走路。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il n'y a pas de bus, je n'ai qu'à marcher.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There's no bus, so I have no choice but to walk.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū zhíde yī dú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre vaut la peine d'être lu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book is worth reading.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhìshǎo yào děng bàn gè xiǎoshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut attendre au moins une demi-heure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You need to wait at least half an hour.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses résultats sont satisfaisants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His grades passed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège shíjiān duì nǐ héshì ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Est-ce que cet horaire te convient ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is this time suitable for you?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 学校将举办一场音乐会。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxiào jiāng jǔbàn yī chǎng yīnyuèhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'école organisera un concert.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The school will hold a concert.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxiào zhōuwéi yǒu hěn duō shāngdiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de magasins autour de l'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many shops around the school.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nóngchǎng lǐ yǒu hěn duō zhū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de cochons dans la ferme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many pigs on the farm.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il aide les autres de son propre chef.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He actively helps others.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons-y ensemble.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go together.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est ta spécialité ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is your major?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis venu exprès pour te voir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I came specifically to see you.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est un peu plus petit que moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a little shorter than me.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait sombre dans la pièce.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The room is very dark.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons protéger l'environnement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should take care of the environment.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū de zuòzhě shì shéi?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qui est l'auteur de ce livre ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Who is the author of this book?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait frais aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's cool today.
